## Source: google-open-source-security (1ac997eb7889bb6aa988bf49e9beb198eb49629764c6fff1ac19cd4e8118b600)
React Native ARIA and @gluestack-ui/utils had unauthorized new versions published
that contained malicious code via a public access token compromise.

The malicious code connects to a command and control server and allows
remote access, including arbitrary command execution.
